title: B'stilla
ingredients: ['2 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '2 tablespoons chicken stock granules', '500ml hot water', '3 eggs', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '1 (500g) packet puff pastry', 'salt and pepper to taste', '55g butter, melted']
